// Modules - All of the modules that are loaded by default
const modern = require('../../src/modern');
const renaissance = mod => ctx => {
  let res = mod(ctx);
  return res ? modern(res)(ctx) : Promise.resolve();
}
 
const plugin = {
  name: 'middle',
  options: {
    public: 'public',
    bodyParser: { extended: true },
    jsonParser: {},
    dataParser: {},
    cookieParser: {},
    compress: {},
    session: {
      resave: false,
      saveUninitialized: true,
      cookie: {}
    },
    responseTime: {},
    methodOverride: {},
  }
};
